titleStmt.title: A briefe and a playne introduction, teachyng how to pronounce the letters of the British tong, (now co[m]menly called Walsh) wherby an English man shal not only w[ith] ease read the said tong rightly: but markyng ye same wel, it shal be a meane for him with one labour and diligence to attaine to the true and natural pronuncation of other expediente and most excellente langauges Set forth by W. Salesburye.
titleStmt.author: Salesbury, William, 1520?-1600?

publicationStmt.publisher: By [R. Grafton for] Roberte Crowley, dwellyng in Elye rentes in Holburne,
publicationStmt.date: The yere of our Lord. M.D.L. [1550]

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Wales.
